content:
The veggie lasagna sounds like a delicious choice!

As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or opinions, nor do I have access to specific information about individual restaurants or their menu items. However, I can suggest some ways to help you make an informed decision:

1. **Check reviews**: Look up reviews on UberEats, Yelp, or Google Reviews to see what other customers have said about the veggie lasagna. Pay attention to the ratings and comments to get an idea of the dish's quality and popularity.
2. **Menu description**: Read the menu description on UberEats or the restaurant's website to get an idea of the ingredients, cooking methods, and flavor profile.
3. **Ask the restaurant**: If you're still unsure, you can contact the restaurant directly through UberEats or their website and ask about the veggie lasagna. They might be able to provide more information or recommendations.
4. **Check the restaurant's social media**: Sometimes, restaurants will post photos or descriptions of their dishes on social media. You might be able to find some visual inspiration or get a better sense of what to expect.

By doing your research, you'll be able to make a more informed decision about trying the veggie lasagna. Buon appetito, and I hope you enjoy your meal!
